title: Software Engineer
description: Develop and maintain web applications using modern frameworks and technologies.
qualifications: Bachelor's degree in Computer Science or related field
3+ years of experience in software development
Proficiency in JavaScript, HTML, CSS, and React
responsibilities: Design, develop, and test software applications
Collaborate with cross-functional teams to define project requirements
Maintain code quality and ensure responsiveness of applications

title: Frontend Developer Intern
description: Assist the frontend team in building UI components using React.
qualifications: Basic understanding of React
Good knowledge of HTML/CSS
Willingness to learn

title: UI/UX Designer
description: Design user interfaces and experiences for web and mobile applications.
qualifications: Bachelor's degree in Design, Human-Computer Interaction, or related field
3+ years of experience in UI/UX design
Proficiency in design tools such as Figma, Sketch, and Adobe XD
responsibilities: Create wireframes, prototypes, and visual designs
Conduct user research and usability testing
Collaborate with developers to implement designs

title: Mobile App Developer
description: Develop and maintain mobile applications for iOS and Android platforms.
qualifications: Bachelor's degree in Computer Science or related field
3+ years of experience in mobile app development
Proficiency in Swift, Kotlin, and cross-platform frameworks like Flutter or React Native
responsibilities: Design, develop, and test mobile applications
Collaborate with cross-functional teams to define app requirements
Ensure app performance, quality, and responsiveness

title: DevOps Engineer
description: Implement and manage CI/CD pipelines, cloud infrastructure, and automation tools.
qualifications: Bachelor's degree in Computer Science or related field
5+ years of experience in DevOps or related roles
Proficiency in cloud platforms (AWS, Azure, GCP) and automation tools (Docker, Kubernetes, Jenkins)
responsibilities: Manage cloud infrastructure and ensure system reliability
Collaborate with development and operations teams to streamline processes

title: Marketing Manager
description: Lead marketing campaigns and strategies to enhance brand awareness and drive sales.
qualifications: Bachelor's degree in Marketing, Business, or related field
5+ years of experience in marketing management
Strong leadership and communication skills
responsibilities: Manage marketing team and coordinate with other departments
Analyze market trends and adjust strategies accordingly

title: Digital Marketing Intern
description: Assist in running social media ads and content creation.
qualifications: Basic knowledge of social media ads
Creative thinking
Good communication skills

title: Content Writer (3-Month Contract)
description: Write blog articles and product descriptions for clients.
qualifications: Strong English writing
SEO knowledge

title: SEO Specialist
description: Optimize website content and structure to improve search engine rankings and drive organic traffic.
qualifications: Bachelor's degree in Marketing, IT, or related field
3+ years of experience in SEO
Proficiency in SEO tools such as Google Analytics, SEMrush, and Ahrefs
responsibilities: Conduct keyword research and optimize website content
Monitor and analyze website performance using SEO tools

title: Social Media Manager
description: Manage and grow social media presence across various platforms to engage audiences and promote brand awareness.
qualifications: Bachelor's degree in Marketing, Communications, or related field
3+ years of experience in social media management
Proficiency in social media platforms and analytics tools
responsibilities: Develop and implement social media strategies
Create and curate engaging content for social media channels
Monitor social media performance and analyze metrics

title: Financial Analyst
description: Analyze financial data and provide insights to support business decisions.
qualifications: Bachelor's degree in Finance, Economics, or related field
3+ years of experience in financial analysis
Proficiency in financial modeling and data analysis tools
responsibilities: Conduct financial analysis and prepare reports
Collaborate with other departments to provide financial insights

title: Part-Time Cashier
qualifications: Basic math skills
Good customer service

title: Contract Auditor
description: Conduct an independent audit for 2025 financial year.
qualifications: ICAN or ACCA certification
5+ years auditing

title: Registered Nurse
description: Provide patient care and support in a hospital setting.
qualifications: Bachelor's degree in Nursing
Valid nursing license
Excellent communication and interpersonal skills
responsibilities: Administer medications and treatments to patients
Monitor patient health and report changes to medical staff
Educate patients and their families on health management

title: Contract Pharmacist
description: Provide prescription services and assist with drug management.
qualifications: Degree in Pharmacy
Valid license

title: Clinic Records Assistant
description: Assist with patient data entry and record organization.
qualifications: Basic computer skills
Good organization skill

title: Policy Analyst
description: Research and analyze public policies to provide recommendations for government agencies.
qualifications: Bachelor's degree in Public Policy, Political Science, or related field
3+ years of experience in policy analysis
Strong research and analytical skills
responsibilities: Conduct research on public policies and their impacts
Prepare reports and policy briefs for government agencies
Collaborate with stakeholders to gather insights and feedback

title: Library Assistant
description: Assist with book cataloging and helping visitors find materials.
qualifications: Good reading culture
Basic organization skills

title: Data Entry Contractor
qualifications: Basic Excel
Fast typing
